org.diirt.vtype

Interface VShort

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Alarm, Display, Scalar, Time, VNumber, VType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PVFieldToVShort

    public interface VShort
extends VNumber, VType
    Scalar short with alarm, timestamp, display and control information. Auto-unboxing makes the extra method for the primitive type unnecessary.
    Author:
    carcassi
